nodes.text: Leaf-tails were a small rodent species native to the planet Dagobah.

A non-sentient species of winged rodent, leaf-tails had membranous leaf-like tails that aided in balance and camouflage. Omnivorous, leaf-tails ate both berries and rodents to sustain itself. They had expandable cheeks used to gather food — typically cyanoberries. They had great agility which helped them jump from tree to tree. Living in nests, leaf-wings attacked in swarms of dozens. The rodents were the main prey of creatures such as greater bogwings.
